claim_actions.name: Immediate Approval - Minor Repair
claim_actions.description: Damage is minor, clearly documented, and within policy limits. Approve repair cost immediately without inspection.

claim_actions.name: Approve with Workshop Inspection
claim_actions.description: Damage is visible but repair cost needs verification. Send to approved workshop for detailed estimate.

claim_actions.name: Request Additional Documentation
claim_actions.description: Photo evidence incomplete. Request additional angles, police report, or incident details before proceeding.

claim_actions.name: Schedule Independent Adjuster Inspection
claim_actions.description: Damage severity unclear or structural damage suspected. Requires in-person professional adjuster assessment.

claim_actions.name: Flag for Fraud Investigation
claim_actions.description: Multiple red flags detected: inconsistent damage pattern, suspicious timing, pre-existing damage, or claim history.

claim_actions.name: Approve Total Loss Payout
claim_actions.description: Repair cost exceeds 70% of vehicle value. Approve total loss settlement based on market value.

claim_actions.name: Partial Approval - Deductible Applied
claim_actions.description: Some damage covered under policy, but deductible or exclusions apply. Approve reduced payout.

claim_actions.name: Reject - Pre-existing Damage
claim_actions.description: Evidence suggests damage occurred before policy coverage or is pre-existing wear and tear.

claim_actions.name: Reject - Outside Coverage Scope
claim_actions.description: Damage type not covered by policy (e.g., mechanical failure, wear and tear, flood without comprehensive coverage).

claim_actions.name: Request Police Report
claim_actions.description: Collision or theft claim requires official police documentation before processing.
